instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear on json instance representation.

href.description: Either a URI [RFC3986] or a URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is a URI Template then the "templated" property should be true.

rel.description: The name of the link relation that consumer may lookup as a secondary key (in addition to the type property) to retrieve actual link details, e.g. href or profile

templated.description: Indicates the "href" property is a URI Template. If not specified, assume the "href" is a URI.

mediaType.description: media type (as defined by RFC 2046) describing the link target

method.description: method for requesting the target of the link (e.g. for HTTP this might be "GET" or "DELETE")

profile.description: Indiciates the json-schema describing the resource expected when derefencing the target resource
